text:
Reminder because Iâ€™ve gotten questions about it.

*This Community Developer Event* is going to be *Sept 3rd.* Taking place morning to mid day, *before club Inbound opens*. The event will be in the *Cambridge/Boston* area. We will more concrete details ASAP. *We will be taking RSVPs soon.* Presentations and time for socialization planned.

*If interested in presenting please contact me.* Grow awareness of your company, your HubSpot related Open Source project, your cool HS dev skills. Presenters will also get a free community pass to Inbound. Not all presenters who apply will get chosen(sorry) we have limited capacity, time-slots, and passes. If you are not chosen we or HubSpot may still be interested in your info however for future activities.

Also just for clarity, this is a community run event not an official HubSpot event. That said HubSpot has been helping a lot with the event, and we *_really appreciate it_*.
